title: Customer Reviews - Ear Wax Clinic
description: Read what our patients say about the Ear Wax Clinic's ear wax removal treatments.
rawContent:
Find your local clinic

Customer Reviews

Here's what some of our happy customers are saying about the Ear Wax Clinic

Good atmosphere and speedy service

“Very good and thorough and the consultant took his time and was very attentive. Good atmosphere and speedy service. I would recommend this clinic to others as my experience was very positive. I would use them again. The clinic is local for me in Liverpool and in a prestigious area. I was well received and seen to very quickly. Overall it was a good experience and I left feeling as though I has been well treated.”

 

Bill, Liverpool

Extremely professional

“After a horrendous and unsuccessful ear irrigation experience with a district nurse, which left my 93 year old Mum too frightened to endure a second attempt I looked for an alternative. I just liked the feel of the Hearing Lab website and the reviews were impressive, so I booked an appointment. Mum was still apprehensive as I explained to Iram when she arrived. She was absolutely lovely, very friendly and caring, talking Mum through the procedure and assuring her about it. Iram was extremely professional and knew her job, which she completed in no time much to the absolute delight of Mum. We were intrigued at being able to view the before and after results on her laptop too! What a fantastic service and a lovely girl. Thank you very much from both of us.”

Fantastic

“Fantastic, professional service - many thanks.”

 

Gareth, Liverpool

I can hear again

“Fantastic service, best money I ever spent. Thank you! Very professional young man - will tell all my family and friends about this clinic. My husband wants me to make an appointment for him - will do that as soon as we get back from hols. Thank you I can hear again.

Chose this clinic because my doctors no longer offer this service, my nearest clinic on NHS was Whitegate Drive. This clinic was 5 mins from my home. My impression of this clinic was very professional man, will use again. Thank you.”

 

Janet, Lytham

Very effective

“Speedy Treatment. I was seen a little earlier than my appointed time. The treatment was very effective and both ears were cleared of wax. It was good value for an instant solution to an irritating problem...I would certainly recommend it, if like me, you are faced with a lengthy wait for ear irrigation on the NHS. The gentleman was very pleasant and got on with the job. The treatment room was well equipped.”

 

Paul, Lancaster

I would recommend this service without hesitation

“I would recommend this service without hesitation, and will using it again in the future. I had a heavy wax build up in both ears.

Paul (the chap who came) arrived on time, and the procedure was carried out in a very professional manner helped by his constant communication at each stage of the process.”

 

Gary, UK

Absolutely fantastic

“It went absolutely fantastic with no discomfort whatsoever. The lady that treated me was very professional and polite and I can't thank her enough for the treatment she gave me.”

 

Sarah, Preston

Find your local clinic

No Clumsy Syringing

Microsuction earwax removal and irrigation earwax removal are safe, quick and comfortable methods of ear cleaning with no mess and no syringing.

Qualified Professionals

Our rigorous selection process ensures you're getting the best possible care and access to a hand-picked network of top specialists.

Certified & Registered

The largest, longest established and most trusted UK & Ireland network of qualified microsuction wax removal & canal cleaning specialists

Convenient Locations

We have hundreds of clinics across the UK & Ireland so we are never that far.

No-wait Appointments

Most of our clinics have same day appointments when you need it.

Easy Contact

Call the clinic and speak directly to an expert who can help.

Find your local clinic
